headline: Exosens awarded an “A” rating by MSCI for its ESG policies
summary: EXOSENS AWARDED AN “A” RATING BY MSCI FOR ITS ESG POLICIES PRESS RELEASE20 NOVEMBER 2025 MSCI's ESG rating, which focuses on companies' environmental, social, and governance practices, has awarded Exosens an “A” rating.This rating recognizes Exosens' efforts in terms of reliability and security, governance, and highlights the positive environmental impact of its technology. headline: Strategy Isn’t in S&P 500. Now It Could Get Kicked Out of Other Indexes.
summary: Strategy  has tried in vain to get included in the  and now the big  Bitcoin  holder could find itself bounced from MSCI indexes.  MSCI, a major provider of global equity indexes, said in October that it plans to review the status of digital asset treasury companies in its indexes.  JP Morgan analysts led by Nikolaos Panigirtzoglou on Wednesday highlighted the risk to Strategy from potential selling of its shares by index funds if MSCI decides to exclude digital asset treasury companies from its various indexes.
